channel.title: Cakes By Cassidy Blog on Cakes By Cassidy
channel.description: Recent content in Cakes By Cassidy Blog on Cakes By Cassidy

item.title: 5 Ways to Bake Healthier
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } If you have been trying to watch what you eat or are trying to cut back on certain foods, then I am here to help! We have all fallen victim to midnight munchies, and sometimes nothing sounds better than some freshly baked brownies. But just because you got a chocolate craving doesn’t mean you have to sacrifice all your hard and healthy work you have been putting in.

item.title: 8 of My Favorite Flavor Combos to Level Up Your Baking Game
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } If you’ve been following me for a while then you know I have an obsession with combining different flavors for the ultimate amount of tastiness. Well, over the years I have discovered quite a few phenomenal combinations and today I am going to be sharing them with you. I hope you enjoy these as much as I have. Some of these are classic combinations most of us have heard of but there is something special about taking a classic and leveling it up.

item.title: Allergy Free Desserts For Everyone to Enjoy
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } There is nothing worse than going to an event and realizing that you can’t eat any of the desserts because they aren’t gluten free or allergen free. This is something I go through every holiday or occasion. It doesn’t upset me much anymore, but it would be nice to get to a party for once and be greeted by a gluten free cupcake.

item.title: Best Tools for Your Home Bakery
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } Hello again! I am back and I am here to help you start your own home bakery, and what better way to start than to obtain all the necessary tools for your bakery. These will be a good start to any bakery and any speciality you are catering toward. Here are 7 of my recommended kitchen tools. KitchenAid Hand Mixer Pretty self explanatory, but this will save you heaps of time and pain by mixing for you.

item.title: 10 Baking Terms for Beginners
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } I once had a chemistry teacher tell me chemistry is a lot like baking but what they should’ve said is that chemistry is a lot easier than baking! If you’re new to baking, I know what you’re thinking, where do I even begin? I would suggest beginning by learning the basic terminology that more advanced and professional bakers use. This will help you better understand what recipes and tutorials call for as well as leading you to become a better baker.

item.title: Treat Yourself to These Christmas Desserts
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } With the holidays fast approaching, I thought it’d be a great idea to share with you two of my family’s favorite Christmas desserts. It is so important to come together during the holidays and spend time with your loved ones making everlasting memories. During this busy time of year I look for simple and easy ideas that will both bring the holiday spirit into my home- while remaining as hassle free as possible.
